name: Luciana's Breakfast Oatmeal Cookies
author: Att's up
summary: I was trying to find something nutritious but yummy, and then I came up with this oatmeal cookie recipe that you can have at breakfast, lunch, dinner, or for a snack.
ingredients: 1 ½ teaspoons shortening (such as Crisco®), or as needed
¼ cup butter, melted and cooled
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir oats, sugar, flour, baking soda, and salt in a medium bowl until combined
Place butter, eggs, milk, and vanilla in a large bowl; mix well
Add the oat mixture to the butter mixture; stir until incorporated
Roll the dough into walnut-sized balls and place 2 inches apart on the prepared baking sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden, about 9 minutes
